internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the project.

projectId.description: A unique identifier for the project, as it is in Trados Cloud Platform.

projectShortId.description: A shortened, numeric identifier for the project, assigned by Trados Cloud Platform.

projectDescription.description: A detailed description of the project.

projectLocationId.description: The identifier for the location where the project is based or managed.

projectGroupId.description: The identifier for the project group.

projectGroupShortId.description: A shortened, numeric identifier for the project group, assigned by Trados Cloud Platform.

projectGroupName.description: The name of the group responsible for the project.

projectStatus.description: The current status of the project. Can have the following values: 'created','in_progress','completed','archived'.

projectTemplateId.description: The identifier for the template used to create the project.

projectTemplateName.description: The name of the template used to create the project.

originSystem.description: The originating system or application where the project was created.

sourceLanguage.description: The source language of the project content.

targetLanguages.description: The target languages for the project content, typically a comma-separated list.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the project was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

quoteCreatedAt.description: The date and time when the project quote was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

quoteApprovedAt.description: The date and time when the project quote was approved. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

completedAt.description: The date and time when the project was completed. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

dueAt.description: The due date and time for the project. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

deliveredAt.description: The date and time when the project was delivered. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

projectSegmentCount.description: The total number of segments in the project.

projectWordCount.description: The total number of words in the project.

projectCharacterCount.description: The total number of characters in the project.

projectFileCount.description: The total number of files in the project.

projectRevenue.description: The total revenue generated by the project.

projectSavings.description: The total savings associated with the project.

projectCurrencyCode.description: The currency code (e.g., USD, EUR) for the project financials.

deliveryTimeDiff.description: The difference in time between the due date and the actual delivery date, measured in seconds.

onTimeStatus.description: A status indicating the punctuality of the project's delivery.

projectCreatorName.description: The name of the user who created the project.

projectCreatorId.description: The identifier for the user who created the project.

deleted.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the project has been deleted.

customFields.description: A string containing custom fields and values specific to the project. Format: 'customField1 = value1 | customField2 = value2'.

projectId.description: A unique identifier for the project associated with the file translation status.

customerId.description: A unique identifier for the customer associated with the file translation status.

languagePairId.description: A unique identifier for the language pair used in the translation.

sourceFileId.description: A unique identifier for the source file associated with the translation.

projectCreationDateId.description: A unique identifier for the date when the project was created.

translationDateId.description: A unique identifier for the date when the translation was performed.

translatorId.description: A unique identifier for the translator who performed the translation.

reviewDateId.description: A unique identifier for the date when the review was performed.

reviewerId.description: A unique identifier for the reviewer who performed the review.

customerReviewDateId.description: A unique identifier for the date when the customer review was performed.

customerReviewerId.description: A unique identifier for the customer reviewer who performed the review.

finalizationDateId.description: A unique identifier for the date when the translation was finalized.

sourceWords.description: The total number of source words in the file.

lockedWords.description: The total number of locked words in the file.

repetitionWords.description: The total number of repetition words in the file.

crossFileRepetitionWords.description: The total number of cross-file repetition words in the file.

perfectMatchWords.description: The total number of perfect match words in the file.

inContextMatchWords.description: The total number of in-context match words in the file.

exactMatchWords.description: The total number of exact match words in the file.

fuzzyMatchWords.description: The total number of fuzzy match words in the file.

newMatchWords.description: The total number of new match words in the file.

machineTranslationWords.description: The total number of words translated by machine translation in the file.

translationDuration.description: The total duration of the translation process, in minutes.

humanTranslatedSegments.description: The total number of segments translated by human translators in the file.

humanTranslatedWords.description: The total number of words translated by human translators in the file.

humanTranslatedCharacters.description: The total number of characters translated by human translators in the file.

reviewDuration.description: The total duration of the review process, in minutes.

reviewedSegments.description: The total number of segments reviewed in the file.

reviewedWords.description: The total number of words reviewed in the file.

reviewedCharacters.description: The total number of characters reviewed in the file.

pipelineDuration.description: The total duration of the entire translation pipeline, in minutes.

canceled.description: A boolean indicating whether the translation project was canceled.

project.description: (Optional) Expand the project dimension associated with the project id using the $expand parameter.

customer.description: (Optional) Expand the customer dimension associated with the customer id using the $expand parameter.

languagePair.description: (Optional) Expand the language pair dimension associated with the language pair id using the $expand parameter.

sourceFile.description: (Optional) Expand the source file dimension associated with the source file id using the $expand parameter.

projectCreationDate.description: (Optional) Expand the project creation date dimension associated with the project creation date id using the $expand parameter.

translationDate.description: (Optional) Expand the translation date dimension associated with the project translation date id using the $expand parameter.

translator.description: (Optional) Expand the translator dimension associated with the translator id using the $expand parameter.

reviewDate.description: (Optional) Expand the review date dimension associated with the review date id using the $expand parameter.

reviewer.description: (Optional) Expand the reviewer dimension associated with the reviewer id using the $expand parameter.

customerReviewDate.description: (Optional) Expand the customer review date dimension associated with the customer review date id using the $expand parameter.

customerReviewer.description: (Optional) Expand the customer reviewer dimension associated with the customer reviewer id using the $expand parameter.

finalizationDate.description: (Optional) Expand the finalization date dimension associated with the finalization date id using the $expand parameter.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the customer.

customerId.description: A unique identifier for the customer, as it is in Trados Cloud Platform.

customerLocationId.description: The identifier for the location where the customer is based or managed.

createdBy.description: The identifier of the user who created the customer.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the customer record was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

keyContactId.description: The identifier for the key contact person for the customer.

keyContactEmail.description: The email address of the key contact person for the customer.

ragStatusName.description: The RAG (Red, Amber, Green) status name indicating the current health or risk status of the customer.

customFields.description: A string containing custom fields and values specific to the customer. Format: 'customField1 = value1 | customField2 = value2'.

deleted.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the customer record has been deleted.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the language pair.

sourceLanguageCode.description: The ISO code representing the source language.

sourceEnglishName.description: The English name of the source language.

sourceParentLanguageCode.description: The ISO code of the parent language for the source language, if applicable.

targetLanguageCode.description: The ISO code representing the target language.

targetEnglishName.description: The English name of the target language.

targetParentLanguageCode.description: The code of the parent language for the target language, if applicable.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the source file.

sourceFileId.description: A unique identifier for the source file, as it is in Trados Cloud Platform.

projectId.description: The identifier for the project associated with the source file, as it is in Trados Cloud Platform.

projectName.description: The name of the project associated with the source file.

fileName.description: The name of the source file.

sourceFileLocationId.description: The identifier for the location where the source file is stored.

fileTypeSettingsId.description: The identifier for the file type settings used for processing the source file.

fileRole.description: The role or category of the source file (e.g., source, reference).

sourceFileSegmentCount.description: The total number of segments in the source file.

sourceFileWordCount.description: The total number of words in the source file.

sourceFileCharacterCount.description: The total number of characters in the source file.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the source file was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the date.

month.description: The month of the date (1 for January, 2 for February, etc.).

day.description: The day of the month (1 to 31).

dayOfWeek.description: The day of the week as a number (1 for Monday, 2 for Tuesday, ..., 7 for Sunday).

dayOfWeekName.description: The name of the day of the week (e.g., Monday, Tuesday, ..., Sunday).

monthName.description: The name of the month (e.g., January, February, ..., December).

dayOfYear.description: The day of the year (1 to 366).

quarter.description: The quarter of the year (1 to 4).

monthNumber.description: The month as a string (e.g., '1' for January).

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the translator.

accountUserId.description: A unique identifier for the account user associated with the translator.

firstName.description: The first name of the translator.

lastName.description: The last name of the translator.

userEmail.description: The email address of the translator.

accountUserLocationId.description: The identifier for the location associated with the user's account.

membership.description: Displays the type of membership the user has with the account: member, collaborator(guest).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the translator's account was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the translator's account was last modified. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

deletedAt.description: The date and time when the translator's account was deleted, if applicable. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

vendorId.description: The identifier for the vendor associated with the translator.

vendorName.description: The name of the vendor associated with the translator.

deleted.description: A boolean indicating whether the translator's account has been deleted.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the reviewer.

accountUserId.description: A unique identifier for the account user associated with the reviewer.

firstName.description: The first name of the reviewer.

lastName.description: The last name of the reviewer.

userEmail.description: The email address of the reviewer.

accountUserLocationId.description: The identifier for the location associated with the user's account.

membership.description: Displays the type of membership the user has with the account: member, collaborator(guest).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the reviewer's account was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the reviewer's account was last modified. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

deletedAt.description: The date and time when the reviewer's account was deleted, if applicable. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

vendorId.description: The identifier for the vendor associated with the reviewer.

vendorName.description: The name of the vendor associated with the reviewer.

deleted.description: A boolean indicating whether the reviewer's account has been deleted.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the customer reviewer.

accountUserId.description: A unique identifier for the account user associated with the customer reviewer.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer reviewer.

lastName.description: The last name of the customer reviewer.

userEmail.description: The email address of the customer reviewer.

accountUserLocationId.description: The identifier for the location associated with the user's account.

membership.description: Displays the type of membership the user has with the account: member, collaborator(guest).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the customer reviewer's account was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the customer reviewer's account was last modified. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

deletedAt.description: The date and time when the customer reviewer's account was deleted, if applicable. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

deleted.description: A boolean indicating whether the customer reviewer's account has been deleted.

fact-vendor-costs.description: Vendor costs fact. Represents the cost details provided by a vendor for a translation project.

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the vendor cost.

projectId.description: The unique identifier for the project for which the vendor cost is being recorded.

customerId.description: The unique identifier for the customer associated with the vendor cost.

languagePairId.description: The unique identifier for the language pair (source and target languages) involved in the project.

vendorOrderTemplateId.description: The unique identifier for the vendor order template used for the cost estimation.

quoteCreatedAt.description: The timestamp when the cost quote was created.

serviceTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the type of service being provided.

quoteReviewedAt.description: The timestamp when the cost quote was reviewed.

quoteApprovedAt.description: The timestamp when the cost quote was approved.

quoteUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the cost quote was last updated.

fileCount.description: The number of files involved in the project.

targetWordCount.description: The total number of words in the target language for the project.

currencyId.description: The unique identifier for the currency in which the costs are recorded.

translationCost.description: The cost of the translation service.

languageCost.description: The cost related to language services for a specific target language.

additionalCost.description: Any additional costs related to the project.

project.description: (Optional) Expand the project dimension associated with the project id using the $expand parameter.

customer.description: (Optional) Expand the customer dimension associated with the customer id using the $expand parameter.

languagePair.description: (Optional) Expand the language pair dimension associated with the language pair id using the $expand parameter.

vendorOrderTemplate.description: (Optional) Expand the vendor order template dimension associated with the vendorOrderTemplateId using the $expand parameter.

serviceType.description: (Optional) Expand the service types dimension associated with the serviceTypeId using the $expand parameter.

currency.description: (Optional) Expand the currency dimension associated with the currencyId using the $expand parameter.

fact-vendor-costs.title: Vendor Costs Metrics

internalId.description: A unique identifier assigned to each currency entry. This is typically an internal database ID used to reference the currency within the system.

name.description: The official name of the currency. This field stores the full name of the currency as recognized internationally.

code.description: The standard three-letter currency code as defined by ISO 4217. This code uniquely identifies the currency.

symbol.description: The symbol used to represent the currency in financial documents and transactions. This symbol is commonly used in pricing and financial reports.

internalId.description: Unique identifier for the vendor order template within the system.

originatingId.description: Identifier originating from the Trados Cloud Platform.

orderTemplateName.description: Name or title of the vendor order template.

vendorId.description: Unique identifier for the vendor associated with this order template.

vendorName.description: Name of the vendor associated with this order template.

locationId.description: Identifier for the location associated with this vendor order template.

accountId.description: Identifier for the account associated with this vendor order template.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the vendor order template was created. (ISO 8601 format)

deleted.description: Indicates whether the vendor order template has been deleted (`true`) or is active (`false`).

internalId.description: An integer representing the internal identifier of the service type.

name.description: A string representing the name or title of the service type.

originatingId.description: Identifier originating from the Trados Cloud Platform.

allowInternal.description: A boolean indicating whether the service type is allowed for internal use.

allowCustomer.description: A boolean indicating whether the service type is allowed for customer use.

allowVendor.description: A boolean indicating whether the service type is allowed for vendor use.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the task owner.

accountUserId.description: A unique identifier for the account user associated with the task owner.

firstName.description: The first name of the task owner.

lastName.description: The last name of the task owner.

userEmail.description: The email address of the task owner.

accountUserLocationId.description: The identifier for the location associated with the user's account.

membership.description: Displays the type of membership the user has with the account: member, collaborator(guest).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the task owner's account was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the task owner's account was last modified. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

deletedAt.description: The date and time when the task owner's account was deleted, if applicable. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

vendorId.description: The identifier for the vendor associated with the task owner.

vendorName.description: The name of the vendor associated with the task owner.

deleted.description: A boolean indicating whether the task owner's account has been deleted.

internalId.description: A unique internal identifier for the quote approver.

accountUserId.description: A unique identifier for the account user associated with the quote approver.

firstName.description: The first name of the quote approver.

userEmail.description: The email address of the quote approver.

membership.description: Displays the type of membership the user has with the account: member, collaborator(guest).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the quote approver's account was created. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the quote approver's account was last modified. Timestamp with 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

vendorName.description: The name of the vendor associated with the quote approver.

taskType.description: A string representing the specific type of the task.

name.description: The name of the task type.

businessKey.description: A key associated with the business context of the task type.

automated.description: Indicates whether the task type is automated (true) or manual (false).

accountId.description: The identifier of the account associated with the task type.

customerId.description: The unique identifier for the customer.

evaluatedAt.description: The date and time when the evaluation was conducted in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

taskId.description: The unique identifier for the task.

totalSegments.description: The total number of segments in the source file.

firstName.description: The first name of the linguist.

lastName.description: The last name of the linguist.

taskTypeId.description: Identifier for the type of task.

startDate.description: Start date of the task in YYYYMMDD format.

startedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was started in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

sourceFileId.description: Unique identifier for the source file associated with the task.

ownerId.description: Identifier for the owner of the task.

completionDate.description: Date when the task was completed in YYYYMMDD format.

completedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was completed in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

dueDate.description: Due date for the task in YYYYMMDD format.

dueBy.description: Timestamp by which the task is due in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

actualDuration.description: Actual duration taken to complete the task, in minutes.

estimatedDuration.description: Estimated duration to complete the task, in minutes.

delivery.description: Difference between the actual duration and the estimated duration.

words.description: Number of words in the source file processed in this task.

taskId.description: Unique identifier for the task, as it is in Trados Cloud Platform.

taskStatus.description: Internal status code for the task.

name.description: Human-readable name of the task status.

internalId.description: Unique internal identifier for the translation origin.

sourceOrigin.description: Internal code indicating the origin of the translation.

description.description: Human-readable description of the translation origin.

internalId.description: Unique internal identifier for the TQE (Translation Quality Evaluation) category.

evaluationSystem.description: System used for the translation quality evaluation.

evaluationMinValue.description: Minimum value in the evaluation range.

evaluationMaxValue.description: Maximum value in the evaluation range.

evaluationCategory.description: Category of the evaluation based on the score range (e.g., green, amber, red).

projectId.description: The unique identifier for the project.

quoteApproverId.description: The unique identifier for the quote approver.

quoteDateId.description: The unique identifier for the quote creation date.

translationPrice.description: The price of the translation service.

languagePrice.description: The additional language price of the translation service.

projectAdditionalPrice.description: The project level additional price of the translation service.

totalRevenue.description: The total price of the project.

savings.description: The savings obtain through the use of the automated translation features.

wordCount.description: The number of words processed during the translation service.

files.description: The number of target files processed during the translation service

approveDate.description: (Optional) Expand the approve date dimension associated with the approve date id using the $expand parameter and "approveDate" value.

currency.description: (Optional) Expand the currency dimension associated with the currency id using the $expand parameter and "currency" value.

quoteApprover.description: (Optional) Expand the quote approver dimension associated with the quote approver id using the $expand parameter and "quoteApprover" value.

quoteDate.description: (Optional) Expand the quote date dimension associated with the quote date id using the $expand parameter and "quoteDate" value.

quoteDateId.description: The unique identifier for the quote creation date.

projectId.description: The unique identifier for the project.

languagePairId.description: The unique identifier for the language pair.

revenueTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the revenue type.

currencyId.description: The unique identifier for the currency.

projectCreationDateId.description: The unique identifier for the project creation date.

numberOfUnits.description: The number of units of the revenue type that generated the revenue.

revenue.description: The revenue generated by the revenue type.

dim-revenue-type.title: dim-revenue-type
dim-revenue-type.description:
The revenue type dimension. 
The dimension stores details about individual cost/revenue types.

internalId.description: The internal unique identifier of the revenue type.

name.description: The name of the revenue type which is displayed in the Trados Enterprise Quote or Price model.

category.description: The Trados Enterprise cost/price category. This field will detail the level where the revenue type will apply. The possible values are: file, language, project.

type.description: Represents the way the revenue type will be applied when calculating the overall cost.

unit.description: Represents the measurement that will be used when calculating the units of the revenue type.

dim-leverage-band.title: dim-leverage-band
dim-leverage-band.description:
The translation leverage band dimension. 
A translation leverage band refers to a specific category or level of similarity between the content being translated and existing translations or reference material.

internalId.description: The internal unique identifier of the leverage band.

bandName.description: The name of the translation leverage band as it is in Trados Enterprise.

translationDateId.description: The unique internal identifier for the translation date.

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the account.

customerId.description: The unique identifier for the customer.

projectId.description: The unique identifier for the project.

languagePairId.description: The unique identifier for the language pair.

sourceFileId.description: The unique internal identifier for the source file.

bandId.description: The unique identifier for the leverage band.

characterCount.description: The total number of characters in the source file.

wordCount.description: The total number of words in the source file.

segmentCount.description: The total number of segments in the source file.

bandCharacters.description: The total number of characters within the specified leverage band.

bandWords.description: The total number of words within the specified leverage band.

bandSegments.description: The total number of segments within the specified leverage band.

canceled.description: A boolean flag indicating whether the specific workflow was canceled or not.

translationDate.description: (Optional) Expand the date dimension associated with the translation date id using the $expand parameter and "translationDate" value.

customer.description: (Optional) Expand the customer dimension associated with the customer id using the $expand parameter and "customer" value.

project.description: (Optional) Expand the project dimension associated with the project id using the $expand parameter and "project" value.

languagePair.description: (Optional) Expand the language pair dimension associated with the language pair id using the $expand parameter and "languagePair" value.

sourceFile.description: (Optional) Expand the source file dimension associated with the source file id using the $expand parameter and "sourceFile" value.

leverageBand.description: (Optional) Expand the leverage band dimension associated with the band id using the $expand parameter and "leverageBand" value.

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description: The bearer access token provided by Auth0.

filter.name: $filter
filter.description:
System query option restricts the set of items returned.
Operations:
1. [Built-in Filter Operations](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BuiltinFilterOperations)
2. [Built-in Query Functions](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BuiltinQueryFunctions)

top.name: $top
top.description: System query option specifies a non-negative integer n that limits the number of items returned from a collection. The service returns the number of available items up to but not greater than the specified value n.

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: System query option specifies a non-negative integer n that excludes the first n items of the queried collection from the result. The service returns items starting at position n+1.

count.name: $count
count.description:
System query option with a value of true specifies that the total count of items within a collection matching the request be returned along with the result.

According to the OData standard the same result is obtain by adding /$count to the service path

expand.name: $expand
expand.description: System query option that specifies a related entity to expand the current response

X-LC-Tenant.name: X-LC-Tenant
X-LC-Tenant.description: The identifier of the account where the request is executed.

X-LC-TraceId.description: A unique identifier for the request. It should be saved in the logs as it can be used to troubleshoot potential issues. When raising a request for support, it should be provided to help with the investigation.

error-model-400.description: Bad Request. The request could not be understood by the server. Check error message and details to further understand the cause.

errorCode.description: Required, non-null, non-empty, language-independent string. Its value is a service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

message.description: Required, non-null, non-empty, language-dependent, human-readable string describing the error.

details.description: Optional, potentially empty collection of structured instances with code, message, and target following the rules above.

error-model-401.description: Unauthorized request. The user could not be identified.

Example 1.message: You are not authorized to perform this action

errorCode.description: Required, non-null, non-empty, language-independent string. Its value is a service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

message.description: Required, non-null, non-empty, language-dependent, human-readable string describing the error.

details.description: Optional, potentially empty collection of structured instances with code, message, and target following the rules above.

error-model-403.description: Forbidden request. The user does not have the necessary permissions for the resource.

Example 1.message: You are not authorized to perform this action

errorCode.description: Required, non-null, non-empty, language-independent string. Its value is a service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

message.description: Required, non-null, non-empty, language-dependent, human-readable string describing the error.

details.description: Optional, potentially empty collection of structured instances with code, message, and target following the rules above.
